home.title: Home
text: Geonesia was created in 2015 in Papeete (Tahiti), French polynesia,
The company is spécialised in mapping and Geographical Information Systems
Geonesia have the capability to use open source softwares beside commercial and proprietary solutions. It keep the company competitive ans affordable focused on human and local competencies.
Geonesia works in environmental thematics and land managment for data collection, processing, analysing and diffusion of geospatial information.

His owner is geographer and begin his education at French Polynesia University. He know well polynesian islands, their organisation and issues for the future. A good relationship with the land administration permit a dialogue with decision-makers and foster the succesful conduct of projects.
Local and international partnerships ensure good reactivity  and sharpened competencies in its areas of intervention.
